## Source: amazon-inspector (aca0601b1d8613895ac524d33f93ab92365d464e80eb526e58e2ca919abba129)
The package atm_bmw was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (65e1253a1ffde4534f1ba20d215fb248aa841e4ee082e9613365b5324d0a93bd)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'atm_bmw' @ 2.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
